text: Póvoa de Varzim (, ) is a Portuguese city in Northern Portugal and sub-region of Greater Porto. In 2001, there were 63,470 inhabitants, with 42,396 living in the city proper. It is the seventh-largest cities in Portugal and the third largest in Northern Portugal. ==References== Category:Cities in Portugal Category:Municipalities of Portugal Category:Porto District
title: Póvoa de Varzim
